DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Pathology Report Repository Upload CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether the diagnostic pathology report will be uploaded to a repository.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition._A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread._A storage location for digital data._To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.:A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

Concepts.definition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.

A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

Property.preferredDefinition: A storage location for digital data.:To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location.

Concepts.definition: A storage location for digital data.
To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A national effort to accelerate the understanding of the molecular basis of cancer through the application of large-scale proteome and genome analysis, or proteogenomics._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that something is indeterminate or unknown.

Concepts.definition: An indication that something is indeterminate or unknown.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
